caption.center: IN RE: APPOINTMENT TO DOMESTIC RELATIONS PROCEDURAL RULES COMMITTEE.

opinion.opinion_text: AND NOW, this 31st day of January, 2011, The Honorable Kathryn M. Hens-Greco, in her capacity as Administrative Judge of the Family Division of the Court of Common Pleas of Allegheny County, Fifth Judicial District, is hereby appointed as a member of the Domestic Relations Procedural Rules Committee to serve at the pleasure of the Court.Page 1
